name: Tiny Chick
description:
Have fun in 1 second, brings joy everywhere at any time.
Tiny Chick was designed for the principle Easy to Learn but Hard to Master. Though it seems simple, it is actually a challenge also.

How to Play:
Tap and hold on the screen, when the track aims a suitable position, release and help the chick jump over the pillars in front of him.

Features:
- Rather simple rule, to be learnt in 1 second;
- Start a new game any time, anywhere;
- Random levels brings different challenges every time;
- Successive pillars makes you concentrated sometimes;
- Lot of cute characters to be collected.
